Pre-Game Insights: The Portland Trail Blazers host the Golden State Warriors in the season opener.
Others: The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Warriors -6; over/under is 223.5
The Warriors averaged 29.3 assists per game on 43.7 made field goals last season.
The Trail Blazers averaged 106.4 points per game last season, 46.8 in the paint, 15.8 off of turnovers and 12.7 on fast breaks.
